Patient’s Testimonies

from: Phil Cutterham 
sent: lunedì 23 marzo 2020 16:25
to: Dott. Guercini 
subject: Re: Concern

 

We are all thinking of you and your country,from all of us in uk,we feel your pain.Please take care and survive,your medical skills cannot be replaced.

Phil.

 

Da: Mike Ossine 
Inviato: mercoledì 15 gennaio 2020 18:25
A: Guercini M. D:
Oggetto: Prostatitis Treatment – Update AUTORIZZATO 20.01.20

 

Dear Doctor,

As discussed, here is my update:  

  1. Symptoms are substantially improved: the heaviness / discomfort due to pudendal nerve inflammation is almost gone (80-90% improvement)
  2. Night trips down to 1 (from 2-3 previously), during the day sometimes 6-8 hours depending on water intake, the flow much better, almost no dripping, bladder feels much more relaxed  
  3. And most important, my severe (acute) symptoms that required me to take antibiotics for several month did not come back – I see 100% success here!

I’m continue to follow your diet and life style directions. Please let me know if you have any other recommendations, medications, supplements if any.

Thank you very much! 

Mike

Da: Hussam Ahmad 
Inviato: lunedì 12 agosto 2019 16:12
A: Federico Guercini 
Oggetto: Re: Update

 

Hi Doctor,

 

Hope you are doing well! 

 

Sorry for the late update, I am feeling great and finally enjoying life! Just a little pain is left but I am very optimistic regarding a full recovery! The progress is great and just need to wait a little, I will send you an update on this. 

I hope everything is going well also at your end.

Kind regards,

Hussam 

 

From: Jose Mxxx [mailto:
josexxx@yahoo.comThis e-mail address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it
]

Date: domenica 20 dicembre 2015 04:12

To: Profesor Federico Guercini MD

Subject: I am Jose xxx, your patient from New York.

 

Dear Doctor Federico Guercini:

 

My dear Doctor and friend, I wish for you, for your family and for the staff of your office a very Merry Christmas and a New Year full of very good health, great happiness and great prosperity. GOD bless you all always.

 

My Dear Doctor, after having received the 3 therapies I am 80% better but still I do not feel completely healthy, in occasion I have discomfort and my erections are not that good. For the next year, if You agree, I’d wish to make the visit to Your office to receive 3 more therapies. Soon I will be writing to You for asking for the appointments.

 

Best regards,

 

Your patient,

 

Jose A xxxx.

 

 

From: Dean T [mailto:
deantxxxx@gmail.comThis e-mail address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it
]

Date: domenica 20 dicembre 2015 04:08

To: Prof. Guercini

Subject: Propecia?

 

Hey fredrico,

How are you? Just thought I would update you my health is good everything going well except my hair is falling out… One doctor recommended me taking small dose of propecia what do you think about this?

Again thank you so much for giving me my health back and merry Christmas! 🙂

Dean

 

 

From: Luiz Otavio [mailto:lotavio@xxxxxxxxx]

Date: mercoledì 16 dicembre 2015 15:17

To: ‘Prof. Guercini MD’

Subject: PACIENTE DO BRASIL LUIZ OTAVIO

 

DR.GUERCINI;

 

HOPE IS GOOD, ONLY TO GIVE FEEDBACK;

 

 

1- OCCURRED IN THE LAST INFILTRATION 10/15/2015;

 

2- MEDICINES THAT MAKE USE DAILY

– 01 CAPSULE OF LIORESAL

-04 DROPS RIVOTRIL

3-USING HOT WATER BAG IN PERINEAL AREA THREE TIMES A WEEK, HELPS REDUCE PAIN

4- I DO NOT USE ANY PAIN MEDICATION

5- ALSO DO NOT USE MORE ANTIDEPRESSANT TRAMADOL AND EITHER

6- GENERALLY TO THIS PAIN IMPROVEMENT BETWEEN 80 AND 90 %

7- ASK IF WE SHOULD INFILTRATIONS DO MORE TO ELIMINATE PAIN

 

THANK YOU SO MUCH

 

 

 

 

Luiz Otávio de xxxxxxxxxx

 

 

 

From: Mladxxx [mailto:
mladxxx@hotmail.comThis e-mail address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it
]

Date: martedì 15 dicembre 2015 12:05

To: Prof. Guercini MD

Subject:Prostatitis2000: Prostatitis

 

Hi doctor Federico Guercini ,

I am Mladen las inyection i had 30.11.2015

Now I am reporting:

I fell wery well,actually one-two week and i will fell perfect like 2 years ago.

I have erection, i wake up with erection.. that problem i think it is now ok.

The only problem I have is the color of my sperm. It is actually a darker color. Before it was very dark, but now it’s a lot brighter .I belive  that will be go back to normal after 1-3 weeks moore. I supose that it is actually blood that is slowly disappearing, and this requires a process.

I didn´t  had sexual intercourse for the simple reason because of the color of my my sperm.

I started working out at the gym and worked exercises of which I had pain in the prostate. But now the next day I got sore muscles, but i don´t have pain in the prostate, so this is another confirmation of my recovery. The stream of urine is getting better, especially after I finished to use the clipper 60ml.

I have a one question ..i forgot to ask you the last time I saw you.

Can I  sometimes take a Cialis?  I don´t have problem with erection but i wont to ask. Becouse if you tell me thah can be harmful for my prostata I will not take thake anymoore.

Thank you  Doctor, once again for your help and I’m glad that I had chose your clinic .

I’ll always be happy to recommend your clinic.

Sincerely Mlaxxx Mxxx

 

 

From: Robert HarrXXX [mailto:grayharXXX@coxXXX]

Date: giovedì 10 dicembre 2015 02:45

To: ‘Prof. Guercini MD’

Subject: Progress

 

Dear Dr. ,

As you told me to do, I am checking in with you 15 days later so that you will know my progress.

Dr. I am a new man!  I have no more pain in my back, scrotum or penis. I don’t have to pee every 15 minutes any more.

Your procedure is a miracle and since I contracted gardnerella 40 years ago I have the energy of an 18 year old now.

Presently though, I am engaged in a bitter diverse with my wife but that has nothing to do with you. Also I have been sleeping through

the night with no need to wake up and go pee every two hours.

You are truly a miracle worker and I hope you have a wonderful holiday season.

Sincerely,

Yours,

Robert W Harrison

PS I will check back in around Christmas  Thanks again.

 

From: François [mailto:
francois.xxx@xxx.xxxThis e-mail address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it
]

Date: giovedì 10 gennaio 2014 12:14

To: Prof. Guercini MD

QUERIDO Amigo,
It was so good and nice to speak with you, Never forget that I am like you.
(from the Italian montains) and you made a such good work with my health that without your help I didn t have the life I m living. Many thanks. The 2 children and Prisca especially would like to see you and your wife. Please accept my new phone number 00 34 xxxxxxxxx. We would be very happy (you cannot imagine) if you can spend days with us during holidays. I know you are still the best surgeon of the world I will call you again during week end Big kisses you Hasta pronto Francois

From: Caspar [mailto:caspar.xxxx @gmail.com]

Date: martedì 4 marzo 2014 18:20

To: Prof. Guercini MD

Subject: Thank you

Dear Professor Guercini,
I doubt you remember me as you must see so many patients but I just wanted to send you a quick e-mail. I’ve been completely symptom free for many months now, so good in fact I celebrated my return to good health by taking a 2 month holiday to allow the body to fully heal and have lots of fun. Not even a hint of relapse, just a constantly improving positive trend.

Without the infiltrations to attack the capsule and calcifications you found, I wholly believe i would still be fighting the disease. (however it may be worth saying, it was repeating oral antibiotics very soon after the infiltrations that really did the trick) On a side note, while fighting prostatitis for a number of years was severely debilitating it was also exceptionally fascinating. It was a terrible experience that created a wonderful spark of fascination in medicine and the desire to help others with suffering and so I have begun my applications to medical school.

Thank you for all your help, I hope this e-mail finds you well and happy,
Kind regards,
Caspar

From. Beau xxx

Sent: mercoledì 26 settembre 2012 00:11

To:
guercini@mclink.itThis e-mail address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it

Dr. Guercini,

How are you doing? I’m flying again and my life is well. Thanks to you I’m 95% cured. I did want to see you next month for some unblocking and hopefully be 100%. Thank you for everything you have saved my life. I will make arrangements similar to before I come to Rome I think I’m going to visit Paris on my way?

Very Respectfully,

Beau

From: Denis Arkxxx

Sent: lunedì 27 agosto 2012 15:09

To: Prof. Guercini MD

Dear Dr Guercini,

Two months have passed and I finished taking medicamentation you prescribed to me. In general I feel much better, thank you for your help.

However as I finished applying atrolin couple weeks ago – some symptoms came back: feel pain (mostly burning) in my anus, occassionally feel pain at the bottom of my bely, and what worries me most is that I almost feel no pleasure when I have orgasm after sex.

Defenitely I feel better and appreciate yor help, but I still have some problems left . Do you think I should just wait a bit and do nothing for now or there is something else we can try?

thank you,

Denis

From: Jan xxxx

Sent: Saturday, February 11, 2012 11:45 AM

Subject: Grazie and report

Dear Professor Guercini,

I want to thank you once again.

I have been feeling 97%!! Grazie mille.

During my last visit you encouraged me to not give up on looking for a relationship. Two months ago I met a very nice lady and we have been dating. A month ago we started being intimate, using condom. Everything is OK, no symptoms.

You mentioned that using a condom is not ideal for a relationship and my girl-friend feels the same. So we both went for blood testing (HIV, Chlamydia, etc.) and she also went to her gynecologist for cultivation (I told her of my recurring problems). We are waiting for the results with the prospect of starting a non-condom relationship.

Please let me know if you would see me if symptoms occur again. Thank you.

Sincerely

Jan

From:
Momxxx@dr.bgThis e-mail address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it

Sent: Thursday, January 19, 2012 3:27 PM

Subject: RE: Patient Yxxx Zxxx

Dear Prof. Dr. Guercini,

First of all, let me thank you again for the consultation, the tests and the procedure performed during my visit on Monday. Though it is early to assess the final outcome, the visit has given me the assurance that my problem finally is being handled with the necessary care and expertise! I hope to be able to report some more visible progress towards recovery soon.

I was able to supply all prescribed medication and started the treatment immediately on Monday evening.

For now, I can say that I have not noticed any side effects from the procedure. The only two things I have noticed so far are increased frequency and quantity of urination as well as somewhat unusual sleepiness. The latter was to be expected, as you kindly explained, and so far has not affected substantially my daily routine. Pain and discomfort have indeed slightly decreased but are still present.

From: alexandros trxx

Sent: Thursday, January 05, 2012 3:54 PM

Subject: Progress – Appointment

Dr. Guercini,

Best wishes for the new year.

I was getting ready to inform you about excellent progress since our infiltrations in September. All types of pain had decreased to a very large extent, i had stopped using Dilatan cones for more than 2 months and i felt that i was slowly getting back to normal.

Best regards,

Alexandros.

From:
Ingknob@aol.xxxThis e-mail address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it

Sent: Saturday, December 24, 2011 12:21 PM

Subject: (Kein Thema)

Dear Prof. Guercini,

my wife Farah and I wish you a happy Christmas and successful new year 2011.

My health condition is unchanged good thanks to your excellent executed medical treatment.

Most cordial regards

Farah and Gottfried Knoxxx

From: Bengt Lxxx

Sent: Monday, November 28, 2011 11:05 AM

Subject: Re: Follow-up from Bengt in Sweden

Dear Prof. Guercini,

I am writing you this to confirm that I am perfectly fine after exactly three months of Vesicare treatment.

I have now applied for a reimbursement from the Swedish national health insurance for the treatments you gave me. They say that they will reimburse me but not based only on the journal I received from you regarding the investigation. They would also like to know more about the treatments that you gave me.

So I would be very grateful if you could provide me with a few lines from your journal both what treatment you gave me and what pharmacies / antibiotics that you used before the Vesicare treatment. It is perfectly fine if you just drop me a few lines in a return mail that has been copied fro your journal. They say that it would be OK for them.

Finally once again, thank you very much for an excellent outcome of your treatment.

Best regards
Bengt

Stockholm, Sweden
